data.title: Opinions of Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel in Curiel de Duero. Official Website.
data.meta_description: Opinions of Residencia Real Castillo de Curiel  in Curiel de Duero. Official Website. Stay in a castle full of history
data.text:
STAY AT HOTEL

An amazing hotel. we were daunted by the position on top of the rock which turned our legs to jelly but it was beautiful and very unique. the location was more severe than we had expected. the hotel is beautifully decorated and has a peaceful atmosphere which is just what we wanted. the roof top pool and terrace were lovely. amazing views. we ate in the restaurant each night (as we couldn't face driving up and down the hill at night). the food was excellent and service very good. the staff were very friendly, helpful and endlessly patient with communications due to our inability to speak spanish. thankyou to all of you. you made our stay very enjoyable.

Read more >Close

JOHN STONE

The location, the atomsphere and the food made this one of my best stays ever. if you are looking for seom where to get awy to this is it.

Read more >Close

GREAT HOTEL

Thank you for having us, we had a great time. we particularly appreciated the possibility of going to the roof terrace at night after dinner to watch the stars while finishing our drinks.

Read more >Close
